title: The Merry-Go-Round Adventure
story: Hey, Lisa. Let's go ride the merry-go-round. What is that? It's a game we can play. Follow me. Okay, Carol. Let's go. Here you get on. I'll push. Wow! This goes fast. Jump on! Okay. Here I go! Yay! This is fun!
summary: Join Lisa and Carol on an exciting adventure as they ride the merry-go-round and discover the thrill of spinning and laughter.
image: An illustration of Lisa and Carol riding the colorful merry-go-round.
